thread.title: Dollar Drops to Lowest Level Since December 2014

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Drops to Lowest Level Since December 2014
text:
The dollar fell to its lowest level in more than three years Thursday as renewed confidence among investors drew money away from the U.S. currency.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently down 0.5% at 82.70, its lowest level since December 2014.
